model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Co-workers B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Co-workers A: I just gave my boss the written report. I hope she finds it helpful.
Co-workers B: Did you make sure to include all the necessary details?
Co-workers A: Yes, I made sure to cover everything we talked about in the meeting. I even added some extra information that I thought could be useful.

[MEMORY]
Co-worker A modernized processes and invested in new technology for the family business after taking over, which has been doing well recently.
Co-worker A gave Co-worker B a pen that they still use and appreciate the gesture.

prediction:

Judgement: No
